Text.Page:
I've killed a lot of things in this temple, but the scariest thing I ever saw was called {@LinkCreature:42#5000#Murassk}, and I got out of there before IT killed ME.

So if you ever feel like you have to prove yourself around here, killing Murassk would be one way to do it.
Good job! You've avenged the dead and made believers out of the living. Here's something I'd like you to have.
